description: This file defines the ScoreRepository interface in Java using Spring Data JPA. It provides data access methods for Score entities, including methods to retrieve all scores ordered by points and creation date, as well as the top 10 scores.

classes.name: ScoreRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for Score entities, extending JpaRepository to inherit CRUD operations and defining custom finder methods.

methods.name: findAllByOrderByPointsDescCreatedAtDesc
methods.description: Retrieves all Score entities ordered by points descending, then by creation date descending.

methods.name: findTop10ByOrderByPointsDescCreatedAtDesc
methods.description: Retrieves the top 10 Score entities ordered by points descending.
